content: We are in a sales call, and your name is Staya and my name is Sam.
Hello, thank you for taking the time to speak with me. This is Staya from Green Solutions. How can I help you today?
Certainly! We have a variety of fresh, high-quality apples available. Can I ask what you will be using the apples for and if you have any preferences on the type of apple you'd like to purchase?

Great choice! Gala apples are delicious and popular. For 10,000 Gala apples, I can offer you a special bulk pricing. Can you please provide me with your location so we can discuss shipping options and provide you with a quote?
Certainly, we can arrange for the delivery of 10,000 Gala apples to the Vatican. Just to confirm, are there any specific requirements or delivery instructions we should be aware of for this shipment?

Perfect. I will process your order for 10,000 Gala apples to be delivered to the Vatican. I will email you the final details including pricing and delivery schedule shortly. Thank you for choosing Green Solutions for your apple purchase!
